text: Ryōgun ga sōgū shita toki, hakkiri to anata ni shirushi ga atta. Hitotsu wa arrā no michi no tame ni gassen suru gunzei,-gai wa fushinjin'na monodeatta. Kare-ra (fushin-sha) no me ni wa,(musurimu gunzei ga) 2-bai ni mieta. Arrā wa o kokoronikanau-sha o, kare no kyūgo de yōgo sa reru. Makotoni sono nakaniha, 炯限Na mono e no kyōkun ga aru
